comments.html: Yeah, but you are on Kindle :)

comments.html: Yep but subscription is not available from Europe locations... :(
comments.name: raybones

comments.html:
No comment. BTW, I always wondered who'd decide to buy a Kindle subscription to a blog. With the new Kindle having Internet access the whole thing is becoming even more irrelevant.

Just FYI: the total sum of revenues collected from this idea in more than a year: $0.00 (down to the fifth decimal).
comments.name: Ivan Pepelnjak
